bio:
Fethis Alor, a Dunmer man, is a merchant living in Raven Rock. He can be found next to his market stall, where he sells wares. He is usually seen wearing a traditional Dunmer outfit. He has a daughter named Dreyla. Dreyla is romantically interested in Modyn Veleth, the captain of the Redoran Guard stationed in Raven Rock. However, Fethis disapproves of Dreyla marrying Captain Veleth.
Similar to the other villagers of Raven Rock, Fethis can be found at the Earth Stone working on it and worshipping it during the night, against his will.
Quotes"
If asked if he knows someone called Miraak: "I think I maybe had a dream about someone with that name..."
name: Fethis Alor
